trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Naples
There were no other sightings in Naples on or around February 10th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was around 2am, while my girlfriend was driving home we noticed something in the sky. At first we didnt think much of it because there are sometimes helicopters flying in the area. But what caught our attention was that the object appeared to be low to the ground, right above tree tops and had no sound coming from it. Usually helicopters make a lot of noise so we were both very surprised and stunned at the same time. We looked right at it as it hovered slowly aboved us with a few lights blinking. I told my girlfriend to turn around so we can take a picture of it and as we were turning it just took off with an amazing speed, and it was gone just like that.
